mapper.select: select * from course ORDER BY cid limit #{0},#{1}
select a.stuid,a.name from student a,sc b, course c where a.stuid=b.stuid and b.cid = c.cid and c.cid=#{2} limit #{0},#{1}
select count(a.stuid) from student a,sc b,course c where a.stuid = b.stuid and b.cid = c.cid and c.cid = #{cid}
select major from student where stuid = #{stuid}
select cname from course where grade=#{0} and major = #{1}
select cid,cname from course where major != #{2} limit #{0},#{1}
select count(*) from course where major!=#{major}
select a.cid from sc a ,student b, course c where a.stuid=b.stuid and a.cid=c.cid and a.status='0' and b.stuid = #{stuid}
select teacherid,tname from teacher where major = #{0}
